item.title: 美国通胀拉锯战后，亚洲市场开盘强劲
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: UPS 称美国南部路易斯安那州的服务可能受到飓风弗朗辛的影响
item.description: 联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周三表示，受飓风 "弗朗辛"（Francine）的影响，该公司在美国南部地区，尤其是路易斯安那州的取件和递送服务可能会受到影响。【原文：United Parcel Service said on Wednesday its pickup and delivery services in the southern part of the U.S., especially Louisiana, may be impacted due to Hurricane Francine.】

item.title: 美国议员敦促拜登堵住中国小包装进口的关税 "漏洞
item.description: 周三，美国众议院大多数民主党议员敦促乔-拜登总统利用其行政权力结束针对低价值包裹的关税 "漏洞"，他们认为中国电子商务公司和芬太尼毒贩利用了这一 "漏洞"。【原文：A majority of Democratic U.S. House of Representatives members on Wednesday urged President Joe Biden to use his executive powers to end a tariff "loophole" for low-value packages that they say are being exploited by Chinese e-commerce firms and fentanyl traffickers.】

item.title: 消息人士称，诺福克南方公司正在商讨首席执行官离职事宜，寻找临时负责人
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士周三透露，诺福克南方公司正在就首席执行官艾伦-肖（Alan Shaw）的离职进行谈判，董事会正在考虑临时替代人选，其中包括现任首席财务官，因为发现这位高管与一名下属有染。【原文：Norfolk Southern is negotiating CEO Alan Shaw's exit, and the board is considering interim replacements, including the current chief financial officer, after finding the executive had a relationship with a subordinate, three sources familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 裕信银行如何收购德国商业银行股份，以求在德国发展壮大
item.description: 周二深夜的欧洲，投资者的疑虑与日俱增。德国政府在市场上出售德国商业银行（Commerzbank）股票的努力陷入了僵局。【原文：It was late on Tuesday evening in Europe and investors' suspicions were growing. The German government's efforts to sell Commerzbank shares in a market placement, on the face of it, a simple task, were stalling.】

item.title: 亚马逊的 AWS 将在巴西投资 18 亿美元，直至 2034 年
item.description: 亚马逊云计算部门亚马逊网络服务公司（AWS）周三表示，将在巴西投资101亿雷亚尔（约合18亿美元），直至2034年，以扩大其在巴西的数据中心业务。【原文：Amazon's cloud computing arm, Amazon Web Services (AWS), will invest 10.1 billion reais ($1.8 billion) in Brazil through 2034 to expand its data center operations in the country, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI 正在洽谈以 1,500 亿美元的估值进行融资
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，人工智能重量级企业 OpenAI 正在讨论以 1500 亿美元的估值融资 65 亿美元。【原文：AI heavyweight OpenAI is discussing raising $6.5 billion at a valuation of $150 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 阿根廷 8 月通胀依然顽固，居民努力储蓄
item.description: 周三公布的官方数据显示，阿根廷 8 月份的月通胀率为 4.2%，高于路透社预测的 3.9%，略高于 7 月份的 4.0%。【原文：Argentina's monthly inflation rate stood at 4.2% in August, official data published on Wednesday showed, as prices came in above a Reuters forecast of 3.9% and up slightly from 4.0% in July.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局局长称对美国联合航空公司的安全审查 "基本完成
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）局长周三表示，该局已基本完成 3 月份开始的对美国联合航空公司的审查，以确保该航空公司遵守安全规定。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said on Wednesday that the agency has nearly completed the review of United Airlines it opened in March to ensure the carrier's compliance with safety regulations.】

item.title: 消息人士称，丹麦 DSV 在德国铁路申克公司 140 亿欧元的竞购中胜出
item.description: 丹麦物流公司 DSV 在收购德国国营铁路 Deutsche Bahn 旗下铁路物流部门全球国际货运公司（Schenker）的竞争中胜出。【原文：Danish logistics company DSV won the race to buy Schenker, the rail logistics arm of German state railway Deutsche Bahn, sources at the railway and at the German government said.】

item.title: 首席执行官表示，RTX 将优先进行精简，而非大规模并购
item.description: RTX 公司首席执行官周三表示，该公司愿意对现有业务进行修剪和配对，而不是进行 "变革性 "并购。【原文：RTX is open to pruning and pairing its existing businesses rather than pursuing "transformative" mergers and acquisitions, the aerospace giant's CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国央行监管机构称亚特兰大联储博斯蒂克违反交易规则
item.description: 美联储内部监察机构周三称，亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）违反了美国央行关于官员如何进行交易和投资的政策，同时指出他没有根据机密信息进行交易。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic violated U.S. central bank policies governing how officials could trade and invest, the Fed's in-house watchdog said on Wednesday, while noting that he did not trade based on confidential information.】

item.title: 美国银行业高管因预期升温而谨慎行事
item.description: 一些美国顶级银行的高管告诫说，不要对盈利预测过于乐观，并警告说，交易环境落后于预期，给这个自去年以来一直处于压力之下的行业的前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Executives at some top U.S. banks cautioned against overly optimistic earnings projections and warned that the dealmaking environment was lagging expectations, clouding the outlook for a sector under stress since last year.】

item.title: 高盛首席执行官公司驳斥通用汽车信用卡退出混乱的说法
item.description: 高盛集团首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）周三驳斥了该行提前退出与通用汽车的信用卡合作关系是一团糟的说法，称该公司已经预料到了问题的存在。【原文：Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon on Wednesday dismissed the notion that the bank's early exit from its credit card partnership with General Motors was messy, saying the firm had anticipated the problems.】

item.title: 原住民组织请求美国最高法院阻止力拓亚利桑那州铜矿项目
item.description: 周三，一个美国原住民组织请求美国最高法院阻止力拓和必和必拓进入亚利桑那州的土地，以建造一个大型铜矿，这是在宗教和文化权利与能源转型对立的长期案件中的最后一次法律努力。【原文：A Native American group on Wednesday asked the U.S. Supreme Court to block Rio Tinto and BHP from gaining access to Arizona land needed to build a massive copper mine, a last-ditch legal effort in a long-running case that pits religious and cultural rights against the energy transition.】

item.title: 部分工人对临时劳资协议不满，波音公司周五可能面临罢工
item.description: 如果这家美国飞机制造商在西北太平洋地区的大部分工厂工人在周四投票支持停工，并拒绝接受一项激怒了许多工人的临时协议，那么波音公司最早在周五就可能面临罢工。【原文：Boeing faces a possible strike as early as Friday if most of the U.S. planemaker's factory workers in the Pacific Northwest vote on Thursday to back a work stoppage and reject a tentative deal that has enraged many of them.】

item.title: 庭审证据显示，前谷歌高管称目标是 "击垮 "竞争对手
item.description: 根据检察官在周三对这家科技巨头的反垄断审判中出示的证据，谷歌的一位高管在 2009 年告诉同事，公司当时刚刚起步的在线广告业务的目标是 "粉碎 "竞争对手的广告网络。【原文：A Google executive told colleagues the goal for the company's then-nascent online advertising business in 2009 was to "crush" rival advertising networks, according to evidence prosecutors presented at the tech titan's antitrust trial on Wednesday.】

item.title: 荷兰政府减持荷兰银行股份至 40.5%
item.description: 荷兰财政大臣埃尔科-海宁（Eelco Heinen）周三在致议会的一封信中表示，荷兰政府最新出售的荷兰银行股份已将其在该银行的持股比例从 49.5% 降至 40.5%。【原文：The Dutch government's latest sale of ABN Amro shares has reduced its stake in the bank to 40.5% from 49.5%, Finance minister Eelco Heinen said in a letter to parliament on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据 Semafor 报道，美国即将为面向沙特阿拉伯的 Nvidia 芯片开绿灯
item.description: 据 Semafor 周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国政府正在考虑允许 Nvidia 向沙特阿拉伯出口先进芯片。【原文：The U.S. government is considering allowing Nvidia to export advanced chips to Saudi Arabia, Semafor reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称德国商业银行管理层寻求保持独立，抵御潜在收购
item.description: 一位熟悉讨论情况的人士周三表示，德国商业银行董事会讨论了如何保持这家德国银行的独立性，并探讨了在联合信贷银行（UniCredit）可能提出竞购的情况下的防御策略。【原文：Commerzbank's board discussed how to keep the German lender independent and explored defense strategies amid a potential bid from UniCredit , a person familiar with the discussions said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命 David Bauer 为 ECM 美洲地区联席主管
item.description: 根据路透社周三看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通已任命大卫-鲍尔（David Bauer）为其美洲股票资本市场的新任联席主管。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has named David Bauer as its new co-head of equity capital markets in the Americas, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 分析师观点 德国商业银行将提高联合信贷银行的收益，但并非没有风险
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）收购德国商业银行（Commerzbank）9% 的股份，提升了合并的前景，长期以来，合并一直被认为是这家意大利贷款机构的自然选择。【原文：UniCredit's purchase of a 9% stake in Commerzbank has raised the prospect of a merger which has long been considered a natural option for the Italian lender, which entered the German market in 2005 by buying Bavarian peer HypoVereinsbank.】

item.title: 消息人士称，收购公司 EQT 探讨以 20 亿美元出售银行圈
item.description: 几位熟悉此事的人士表示，私募股权公司 EQT 正在探索出售其在 Banking Circle 的多数股权，希望任何交易都能使这家支付处理商的估值超过 20 亿美元（包括债务）。【原文：Private equity firm EQT is exploring a sale of its majority stake in Banking Circle, hoping any deal would value the payments processor at more than $2 billion, including debt, several people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 银行股息推动第二季度全球派息创历史新高
item.description: 2024 年第二季度，银行继续推动全球股息创下历史新高，因为利率上升促进了利润，使银行能够向股东支付比上一年更多的回报。【原文：Banks continued to propel global dividends to record highs in the second quarter of 2024 as higher interest rates boosted profits, allowing them to pay out bigger returns to shareholders compared with the previous year.】

item.title: 风险投资基金在诉讼后终止支持黑人妇女的赠款计划
item.description: 总部位于亚特兰大的一家风险投资基金周三同意停止运营一项向黑人妇女经营的小型企业提供资助的计划，以解决一个反平等权利行动组织提起的诉讼，该组织声称该计划存在种族歧视。【原文：An Atlanta-based venture capital fund on Wednesday agreed to stop operating a program that awarded grants to small businesses run by Black women to settle a lawsuit by an anti-affirmative action group that claimed it discriminated based on race.】

item.title: 欧洲分散银行业的并购障碍
item.description: 继今年西班牙对外银行（BBVA）恶意收购萨瓦德尔银行（Sabadell）之后，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）收购德国商业银行（Commerzbank）股份的举动加剧了人们对欧洲银行业进一步整合的猜测。【原文：UniCredit's purchase of a stake in Commerzbank has fuelled speculation about further European banking consolidation, after this year's hostile bid for Sabadell by Spain's BBVA's .】

item.title: 商业团体敦促渥太华阻止加航飞行员罢工
item.description: 约 100 个商业团体周三敦促渥太华阻止加拿大航空公司飞行员罢工，称罢工将扰乱供应链，破坏加拿大作为可靠合作伙伴的声誉。【原文：Around 100 business groups on Wednesday urged Ottawa to prevent a strike by Air Canada pilots, saying a stoppage would disrupt supply chains and spoil Canada's reputation as a reliable partner.】

item.title: 智利矿业公司 Codelco 与 Ministro Hales 工会提前达成合同协议
item.description: 智利国营铜矿商 Codelco (COBRE.UL) 周三表示，已与 Ministro Hales 工人工会提前达成了合同协议。【原文：Chile's state copper miner Codelco (COBRE.UL) said on Wednesday it has reached an early contract agreement with the Ministro Hales workers union.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会主席希望 SpaceX 的 Starlink 部门面临更多竞争
item.description: 联邦通信委员会主席杰西卡-罗森沃塞尔（Jessica Rosenworcel）周三表示，她希望看到 SpaceX 的互联网卫星星座 Starlink 有更多的竞争对手。【原文：Federal Communications Commission chair Jessica Rosenworcel said Wednesday she wants to see more competition to SpaceX's internet satellite constellation Starlink.】

item.title: 中国吉利为欧洲工厂选址
item.description: 中国汽车制造商吉利汽车集团公司的高管在法兰克福接受路透社采访时表示，该公司正在欧洲物色建厂地点，但尚未完全承诺在当地建厂。【原文：Chinese carmaker Geely is scouting locations for a plant in Europe but has not committed fully to building up local production, executives from the car conglomerate said in interviews with Reuters in Frankfurt.】
